page.title: 08Playgroup Interview
page.content: Mrs Carol Johnston started the playgroup.It started 2 years ago in 1983.The playgroup is Monday,Wednesday and Friday mornings for 2 hours. 9.00 to 11.00.They play with small toys, plasticine ,they draw with paints and crayons.Theer are 13 children in the playgroup.Every mother helps.They play in the hall where the playgroup's held.If it is nice they are taken to the park They enjoy it most of the time.They play well together most of the time.Alister Moffat is the youngest he is 2\ years old.It costs alot to run a playgroup because of the rent of the hall and the heating.They sometimes have a coffee evening or a sale of work or a beatle drive to raise the money.This would pay for new equipment that they need.Most of the money will go to buy new toys.
